snippet: Researchers use an algorithm to detect a type of tax shelter dodge used by partnerships.
abstract: New academic research is attempting to use artificial intelligence to fight corporate tax evasion; goal is to enable Internal Revenue Service to more effectively probe sophisticated tax shelters that hide tens of billions of dollars annually.
lead_paragraph: Researchers use an algorithm to detect a type of tax shelter dodge used by partnerships.

headline.main: Computer Scientists Wield Artificial Intelligence to Battle Tax Evasion
headline.print_headline: Researchers Enlist Artificial Intelligence to Fight Tax Evasion
